news.b2: "CAPITAL-T" is one of the largest distribution companies in the Republic of Tajikistan, engaged in wholesale trade and distribution of food products, perfumes and cosmetics, hygiene products, and more.
news.b3: Since 2000, LLC "CAPITAL-T" has been developing dynamically, establishing new partnerships, increasing the number of clients, improving the company’s material and technical base, and upgrading software.
news.b4: The company regularly works on expanding its sales geography, aiming to cover remote and hard-to-reach areas of the republic. The organizational structure is changing, and wholesale operations are actively developing.
